info.description: Distributor-SPJ-Rebate API will give distributors the ability to retrieve SPJ rebate information seamlessly in their ecosystem. This is available only for NAM distributors using SE Advantage application for quotation management.
info.title: Distributor-SPJ-Rebate

parameters.name: quoteNumber
parameters.description: Quote Number for which Rebate Lines are to be retrieved. Eg; Q-203645

500.description:
The requested URL does not exists or the API is not available right now.
	Eg;{"errorCode":"INTERNAL SERVER ERROR,"errorMessage": "This information is not available right now"}

RebateLinesResult.description: Result of the RebateLines returning the quote details and the list of rebate quote lines for the quote.

authorizedNetPrice.description: The authorized net price for Rebate lines only.

billToAccountNumber.description: The number that references the generated claim.

controlNumberForClaim.description: The number that references the generated claim.

createdBy.description: The user that created the quote in SEAdvantage application.

createdDate.description: The date at which rebate was submitted in the SEAdvantage application.

customer.description: The number that references the generated claim.

proposalCity.description: The city whtere the project will be constructed.

proposalState.description: The state where the project will be constructed.

quoteName.description: The quote name that identifies the quote in the SEAdvantage application.

quoteNumber.description: The quote number that identifies the quote in the SEAdvantage application.

quoteToName.description: The number that references the generated claim.

totalAmount.description: The total stock cost of material.

totalRebateAmount.description: The total rebate amount of the through stock material on the project.

authorizedUnitPrice.description: The authorized sell price of one unit of the product.

costPer.description: The quantity sold in each package.

distributorSellNetPrice.description: The authorized sell price of one unit of the product times margin.

extendedRebateAmount.description: The extended credit amount on line item.

itemDesignation.description: The label attached to the line item.

lineDisplayNumber.description: The unique identifier of line item.

spjRebate.description: The identifier that is used for material sold through stock or drop shipped.

totalOrderQuantity.description: The quantity of product that has been quoted.

unitListPrice.description: The unit list price of product.

example.errorMessage: This Quote Number is not known

errorMessage.example: This Quote Number is not known
This information is not available right now
